hooks.command: osascript -e "display notification \"Claude is waiting for your input\" with title \"Claude Code\" sound name \"Glass\""
osascript -e "display notification \"Claude needs your permission\" with title \"Claude Code\" sound name \"Ping\""
osascript -e "display notification \"Task complete\" with title \"Claude Code\" sound name \"Submarine\""

bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); FILE_PATH=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // empty"); if [[ -z "$FILE_PATH" ]]; then exit 0; fi; if [[ "$FILE_PATH" == *.ts || "$FILE_PATH" == *.tsx || "$FILE_PATH" == *.js || "$FILE_PATH" == *.jsx ]]; then yarn run prettier --write "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$FILE_PATH" == *.md || "$FILE_PATH" == *.mdc ]]; then npx markdownlint --fix "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi'
